trans-unit.target: Signature du travail SignTool avec {count} fichiers.
trans-unit.note: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Le certificat est arrivé à expiration.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is not yet time valid.
trans-unit.target: La date de début du certificat n’est pas encore valide.
trans-unit.note: A certificate has a validity period with start and end dates. "not yet time valid" means that the start date is in the future.

trans-unit.target: {fileName} Err {error}
trans-unit.note: {fileName} is a file name and {error} is verbose output from a tool. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: {fileName} Out {output}
trans-unit.note: {fileName} is a file name and {output} is verbose output from a tool. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Signature du travail Mage avec {count} fichiers.
trans-unit.note: {Locked="Mage"} is another signing tool. {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Création du répertoire {path}.
trans-unit.note: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Répertoire {path} supprimé.
trans-unit.note: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Suppression du répertoire {path}.
trans-unit.note: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Le répertoire {path} existe toujours.
trans-unit.note: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Modification du travail AppInstaller avec {count} fichiers.
trans-unit.note: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: An unspecified error occurred during VSIX signing.
trans-unit.target: Une erreur non spécifiée s’est produite lors de la signature VSIX.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while attempting to delete directory {path}.
trans-unit.target: Une exception s’est produite lors de la tentative de suppression du répertoire {path}.
trans-unit.note: {path} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Certificat récupéré. [{milliseconds} ms]
trans-unit.note: {milliseconds} is a decimal number representing the number of milliseconds elapsed, and "ms" is the unit abbreviation for milliseconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Fetching certificate from Azure Key Vault.
trans-unit.target: Récupération du certificat à partir d’Azure Key Vault.
Extraction du conteneur {ContainerFilePath} vers {DirectoryPath}.
trans-unit.note: {ContainerFilePath} is a file path and {DirectoryPath} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: {0} timed out and could not be killed.
trans-unit.target: {0} a expiré et n’a pas pu être arrêté.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a file path.

trans-unit.source: {fileName} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {exitCode}.
trans-unit.target: {fileName} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {exitCode}.
trans-unit.note: {fileName} is a file name and {exitCode} is a number representing the error code returned from a process. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: {0} took too long to respond. The process exit code is {1}. Arguments: {2}
trans-unit.target: {0} a mis trop de temps à répondre. Le code de sortie du processus est {1}. Arguments : {2}
trans-unit.note: {0} is a file name. {1} is a process exit code. {2} is process arguments.

trans-unit.target: Running {fileName} with parameters: '{args}'.
trans-unit.note: {fileName} is a file name and {args} is process arguments. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Reconstruction du conteneur {ContainerFilePath} à partir de {DirectoryPath}.
trans-unit.note: {ContainerFilePath} is a file path and {DirectoryPath} is a directory path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: SignAsync appelé pour {filePath}. Utilisation locale de {localFilePath}.
trans-unit.note: {filePath} and {localFilePath} are both file paths. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: Performing attempt #{attempt} of {maxAttempts} attempts after {seconds} s.
trans-unit.target: Exécution de la tentative n° {attempt} sur {maxAttempts} après {seconds} s.
trans-unit.note: {attempt} and {maxAttempts} are numbers representing the current attempt (as a number) and the maximum allowed attempts (as a number). "s" is the unit abbreviation for seconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Impossible de signer {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a file path.

trans-unit.target: Échec de la signature. Tentatives dépassées.
Échec de la signature avec l’erreur {errorCode}.
trans-unit.note: {errorCode} is an error code. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Signature de {filePath}.
trans-unit.note: {filePath} is a file path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Signature réussie.
{filePath} signé en {millseconds} ms
trans-unit.note: {filePath} is a file path, {milliseconds} is a decimal number representing the number of milliseconds elapsed, and "ms" is the unit abbreviation for milliseconds. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.target: Envoi de {filePath} pour signature.
trans-unit.note: {filePath} is a file path. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be an empty string.
trans-unit.target: La valeur ne peut pas être une chaîne vide.
Signature du travail OpenVsixSignTool avec {count} fichiers.
trans-unit.note: {count} is the number of files to be signed. The literal text inside the brackets should not be localized.
